h1_title: How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor
content:
Interacting with Xu Dog in the Painted Realm now offers the option to Request Medicine. Each time you do this, Xu Dog will provide you with potions. 

You'll need to wait a little while before new medicines are available, but you'll know when they are if the red dot next to Request Medicines appears.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "How_to_Unlock_the_Zodiac_Village_and_Upgrade_Armor.md", within the section "How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor" and the sub-section "Request Medicines from Xu Dog". The content is presented below:

Interacting with Xu Dog in the Painted Realm now offers the option to Request Medicine. Each time you do this, Xu Dog will provide you with potions. 

You'll need to wait a little while before new medicines are available, but you'll know when they are if the red dot next to Request Medicines appears.
